name: Galactic Commando
description:
This is a prototype for a simple shooter game.  There are two levels, and in both, you are trying to reach 250 points without dying.  There are currently 3 classes of enemies.

You are a galactic commando tasked with investigating one of Earth's furthest reaching outposts.  Four months ago, High Command lost all contact with the station, but the automatic positioning beacon assures us that it is still reasonably intact.  Your mission is to investigate what happened, and respond to any hostile forces in kind.

For this mission, you will the standard XR-Q rifle, which has standard high penetration rounds along with a static pulse cannon.

Controls:

WSAD -Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Q - Switch Weapon

Left Click - Fire Weapon

Mouse - Look Around

Left Shift - Sprint
